app_description: App Features: Payments Send receive and store payments from friends family and colleagues Pay retailers Device based security Easily identifiable verifiable and secure bitcoin payments Easy to make online purchases from places like Expedia Overstock Microsoft Craigslist and 70 000 other merchants accepting bitcoin Native camera scanning More supported forms of cryptocurrency coming soon Communication High quality voice calling Private messaging and group messaging Secure private communication between users allows payments to be coordinated virtually and efficiently Agents Agents working with amaano make extra money by being an amaano agent Easily add money to your virtual wallet by giving cash to amaano agents Developer website: Amaano.com For any issue with the app please contact us hello amaano.com
